name: FProjectileData
comment: Copyright 2016-2018 Coffee Stain Studios. All Rights Reserved.

properties.name: ProjectileStickSpan
properties.comment: How long the projectile will live after it has gotten stuck to something

properties.name: ImpactDamage
properties.comment: Damage dealt to actor that get hit or impacted by this projectile

properties.name: ShouldExplodeOnImpact
properties.comment: If we impact something, should this projectile explode so that it deals radius damage?

properties.name: CanTriggerExplodeBySameClass
properties.comment: Indicates if we should explode if we are taking damage from same actor class as ourselves

properties.name: ExplodeAtEndOfLife
properties.comment: Should the projectile explode when it dies of lifespan?

properties.name: DamageType
properties.comment: type of damage used for impact damage

properties.name: DamageTypeExplode
properties.comment: type of damage used for detonation

name: AFGWeaponProjectileFire
comment: Weapon that fires client side projectiles.
